sentences.english: The slogan of Harmonious Society has strong flavors in Confucianism and Socialism.
sentences.chinese: 和谐社会的口号和儒教及社会主义相当对味。

sentences.english: Confucian philosophy in Song dynasty treats rite as ultimate concern and so it's called Neo-Confucian religious philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 宋儒哲学以“理”为终极关怀，故称之新儒教哲学。

sentences.english: While Hong Mansion is in a heavy atmosphere of Confucianism, obviously, which is the reflection of Confucianism in the real world.
sentences.chinese: 荣国府充满着强烈的儒教氛围，是儒教在人间的折射。

sentences.english: While Hong Mansion is in a heavy atmosphere of Confucianism, obviously, which is the reflection of Confucianism in the real world.
sentences.chinese: 荣国府充满着强烈的儒教氛围，是儒教在人间的折射。

sentences.english: Society is accepted within Confucianism and the philosophy encourages its followers to engage in it.
sentences.chinese: 社会为儒教所接受且儒教鼓励人们融入社会。

sentences.english: Society is accepted within Confucianism and the philosophy encourages its followers to engage in it.
sentences.chinese: 社会为儒教所接受且儒教鼓励人们融入社会。

sentences.english: Confucianism provides another important ingredient in the Asians' success as well.
sentences.chinese: 儒教也为亚洲人的成功提供了另一个要素。

sentences.english: Second, against the Yuan Tian Yong-fu will Confucianism as a "state religion."
sentences.chinese: 其二，反对元田永孚将儒教定为“国教”。

definition: Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
Confucian thoughts/the thinking of the Confucian school
the teaching of Confucius and Mencius
to believe in (a deity or other supernatural being)/to worship
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
